#!/usr/bin/env ruby
def make_args(str) final = [] args = str.split(/\s+/) args.each_index() do |i| final << "${#{i+1}:#{args[i]}}" end
final.join(" ") end
methodname = ENV['TM_CURRENT_WORD'] selected = false if ENV['TM_SELECTED_TEXT'] selected = true methodname = ENV['TM_SELECTED_TEXT'] end
methodregex = Regexp.new("^(\\s*)(let|method(?:\\s+private)?(?:\\s+virtual)?)\\s+#{Regexp.escape(methodname.strip)}\\s+([^=]+)=")
$stdin.each_line() do |line| if methodregex.match(line) print "#{if selected then methodname end} #{make_args($3.strip)} $0" break end end
